dc:title: Francis and Ignatius
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Admires new pictorial lives of St. Francis of Assisi and St. Ignatius giving a brief biography of each saint noting their work and radical conversions.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 709 1956-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
